name: Diver's Watches
description: Watches specifically designed for underwater diving that feature water resistance greater than 1.0 MPa (10 atm), the equivalent of 100 m (330 ft). Examples: Rolex Submariner, Omega Seamaster.

name: Chronographs
description: Watches that combine a display watch and a stopwatch. Examples: Rolex Daytona, Omega Speedmaster.
